trans-unit.source: Provides a common base implementation for writers of out-going request parameters for Web service clients implemented using HTTP but without SOAP.
trans-unit.target: 为使用 HTTP 实现但不支持 SOAP 的 Web 服务客户端提供传出请求参数编写器的通用基实现。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.MimeParameterWriter> and other classes in the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols> namespace support the .NET Framework's implementations of Web services via the HTTP-GET and HTTP-POST operations.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.MimeParameterWriter> 和中的其他类<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols>命名空间支持通过 HTTP GET 和 HTTP POST 操作的 Web 服务的.NET Framework 的实现。

trans-unit.source: Web service writers and readers serialize and deserialize, respectively, between the parameters or return objects of Web methods and the HTTP request or response streams.
trans-unit.target: Web 服务编写器和读卡器序列化和反序列化，分别的参数或返回对象的 Web 方法的 HTTP 请求或响应流之间。

trans-unit.source: Web service writers and readers use HTTP for transport but don't exchange messages using the SOAP standard.
trans-unit.target: Web 服务编写器和读卡器使用 HTTP 传输，但不交换使用 SOAP 标准的消息。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.MimeParameterWriter> class establishes a common request-writing format for client-side writing of Web method parameters into HTTP request streams.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.MimeParameterWriter>类建立到 HTTP 请求流的客户端编写的 Web 方法参数的常用请求写入格式。

trans-unit.source: You will typically not need to use <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.MimeParameterWriter> or its descendant classes directly.
trans-unit.target: 你通常不需要使用<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.MimeParameterWriter>或直接其子代类。

trans-unit.source: Instead, when the Wsdl.exe tool generates client proxy code according to the HTTP-GET or HTTP-POST implementations, it applies the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpMethodAttribute> to each Web method and sets the attribute's <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpMethodAttribute.ParameterFormatter%2A> property to the appropriate type.
trans-unit.target: 相反，当 Wsdl.exe 工具生成的 HTTP GET 或 HTTP POST 实现根据客户端代理代码，它适用<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpMethodAttribute>指向每个 Web 方法和设置特性的<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpMethodAttribute.ParameterFormatter%2A>为适当的类型的属性。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Protocols.MimeParameterWriter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Protocols.MimeParameterWriter" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The HTTP request's original Uniform Resource Locator (URL).
trans-unit.target: HTTP 请求的原始统一资源定位符 (URL)。

trans-unit.source: The Web method parameter values to be added to the URL, if necessary.
trans-unit.target: 要添加到 URL 中的 Web 方法参数值（如果需要）。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, modifies the outgoing HTTP request's Uniform Request Locator (URL).
trans-unit.target: 在派生类中重写时，修改传出 HTTP 请求的统一请求定位符 (URL)。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> object that contains the modified, outgoing HTTP request's Uniform Request Locator (URL).
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.String" /> 对象，包含已修改的传出 HTTP 请求的统一请求定位符 (URL)。

trans-unit.source: Of the classes derived from <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.MimeParameterWriter>, only <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.UrlParameterWriter> modifies the HTTP request URL.
trans-unit.target: 派生自的类的<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.MimeParameterWriter>，则只<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.UrlParameterWriter>修改 HTTP 请求 URL。

trans-unit.source: The out-going request, where the <see cref="T:System.Net.WebRequest" /> class allows transport protocols besides HTTP.
trans-unit.target: 传出请求，其中 <see cref="T:System.Net.WebRequest" /> 类允许 HTTP 以外的传输协议。

trans-unit.source: The Web method parameter values.
trans-unit.target: Web 方法的参数值。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, initializes the out-going HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: 在派生类中重写时，初始化传出 HTTP 请求。

trans-unit.source: Of the classes derived from <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.MimeParameterWriter>, only <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.HtmlFormParameterWriter> implements the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.MimeParameterWriter> method.
trans-unit.target: 派生自的类的<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.MimeParameterWriter>，则只<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.HtmlFormParameterWriter>实现<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.MimeParameterWriter>方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the encoding used to write parameters to the HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于将参数写入到 HTTP 请求的编码。

trans-unit.source: The encoding used to write parameters to the HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: 用于将参数写入到 HTTP 请求的编码。

trans-unit.source: An encoding, as represented by the <xref:System.Text.Encoding> class, defines how to transform characters into a sequence of bytes.
trans-unit.target: 编码、 所表示的<xref:System.Text.Encoding>类中，定义如何将字符转换为一个字节序列。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether Web method parameter values are serialized to the out-going HTTP request body.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否将 Web 方法参数值序列化到传出 HTTP 请求的正文中。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the Web method parameter values are serialized to the out-going HTTP request body; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 Web 方法的参数值序列化到传出 HTTP 请求的正文中，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.MimeParameterWriter.UsesWriteRequest%2A> property determines whether the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.MimeParameterWriter.WriteRequest%2A> method is invoked.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.MimeParameterWriter.UsesWriteRequest%2A>属性确定是否<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.MimeParameterWriter.WriteRequest%2A>调用方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.MimeParameterWriter> class's implementation of <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.MimeParameterWriter.UsesWriteRequest%2A> returns a value of `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.MimeParameterWriter>类的实现<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.MimeParameterWriter.UsesWriteRequest%2A>返回的值`false`。

trans-unit.source: The only derived class that overrides <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.MimeParameterWriter.UsesWriteRequest%2A> is <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.HtmlFormParameterWriter>, whose implementation returns a value of `true`.
trans-unit.target: 唯一的派生类，并重写<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.MimeParameterWriter.UsesWriteRequest%2A>是<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.HtmlFormParameterWriter>，其实现返回的值`true`。

trans-unit.source: An input stream for the outgoing HTTP request's body.
trans-unit.target: 传出 HTTP 请求的正文的输入流。

trans-unit.source: The Web method parameter values.
trans-unit.target: Web 方法的参数值。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, serializes Web method parameter values into a stream representing the outgoing HTTP request body.
trans-unit.target: 在派生类中重写时，将 Web 方法的参数值序列化到表示传出 HTTP 请求正文的流中。

trans-unit.source: Of the classes derived from <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.MimeParameterWriter>, only <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.HtmlFormParameterWriter> implements the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.MimeParameterWriter.WriteRequest%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 派生自的类的<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.MimeParameterWriter>，则只<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.HtmlFormParameterWriter>实现<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.MimeParameterWriter.WriteRequest%2A>方法。
